name: MLB® The Show™ 22 Tech Test
description:
This Tech Test is intended to help gameplay experience for MLB The Show 22. We appreciate your support/feedback to help make our game better. Please note: this will be a limited Diamond Dynasty experience and by no means representative of the final product. Learn more at theshow.com/techtest.

https://www.playstation.com/en-us/legal/ps5-system-software-beta-agreement/
